div.class: ant-typography hide-scroll text-default font-weight-light font-14 mb-0 cdph-address d-none d-block-md mt-1

button.class: btn btn-round-icon btn-default align-middle justify-content-center p-0 btn-secondary-action mr-4

div.span: We believe elevating where you live is about blending it seamlessly with how you live. We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you live is where you come alive. In an area flourishing with convenience, recreation and possibility, Avalon Baker Ranch offers 1-, 2-, and 3-bedroom apartment homes for lease. Imagine entertaining in a modern kitchen with quartz stone countertops and stainless steel appliances. Live your life effortlessly with amenities that include a state-of-the-art fitness center, a sparkling swimming pool and beautifully landscaped courtyards with gas barbecues and fire pits to use as if they were in your own back yard without all of the maintenance. Plus, our technology package, AvalonConnect, offers pre-installed high-speed and common area WiFi, digital resident services including the ability to submit service requests and pay your rent online, smart access entry, smart thermostats, package service, and more. Desirably located near Alton Parkway, Bake Parkway, Interstates 5 and 405, and the 241 Toll Road, commuting is a breeze. This is not just apartment living. This is living up.

div.h2: The service. The standards. The life.

a.div: Great service is one of the things we think about most. We start with selecting passionate people. Then we let them put that passion to work. Our people are a vital part of what shapes the character of each Avalon community.

We strive to align our standards with yours, delivering an experience that lives up to them. We know you've put a lot into getting to where you are in life. We believe where you live should reflect that. So we put ourselves into making sure it does.

Effortless. Enjoyable. Truly comfortable living is both. That's why we go out of our way to choose locations and to design amenities that put so much within reach. So you can live easy without even trying.

div.div: Room dimensions, square footage, and features shown on the floor plan drawings are approximate and may vary between individual apartments that have similar layouts. Furniture shown on the floor plan drawings is representative and individual apartments come unfurnished unless specified otherwise. Quoted rent is per month for new move-ins to the community, based on the move-in date selected. Pricing may vary based on lease term. Quoted rent does not including other fees and charges that may be part of your lease (i.e. utilities, parking, etc.). Please contact the community for details. Prior to signing a lease, quoted rent, specials, availability, and other terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. Washington State - We require our own screening and do not accept comprehensive reusable tenant screening reports.

div.p: Curious about the community layout? You can download the community site map here.

div.h2: Only the best for your best life

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Homes fully furnished and connected to give you the lifestyle you deserve. Flexible lease terms for the ultimate convenience.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Signature Collection homes are where our unique designs and top features come together.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: See what we do to take pet friendly living to the next level.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: From fitness amenities to resident perks, we offer a variety of spaces and places to help you meet your wellness goals.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Start earning points on rent with our free residents reward program. Use your points for travel, future rent credit, fitness classes, and more.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Our technology package gives you ease of access and can allow you to save on monthly expenses.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Pay rent, submit a service request, find policies and more with our convenient online resident portal.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Offering a wealth of resident resources, our Relocation Advantage program assists in making your transition a smooth one.

h3.class: ant-typography community-amenities-title font-primary font-24 text-default font-weight-normal

div.div: Pet friendly community featuring WAG Pet Spa and outdoor WAG Pet Park View more details

Signature Collection upgrades in select homes featuring kitchens with quartz stone countertops, tile backsplash, hard surface plank flooring, GE CafÃ© Series stainless steel appliances, and exclusive service offerings
Open-plan, modern kitchens with quartz stone countertops and ENERGY STARÂ® stainless steel appliances
Sparkling salt water swimming pool with sundeck, cabanas, and Jacuzzi hot tubs
Our technology package, AvalonConnect, offers high-speed internet, powered by Cox Communications, pre-installed in your apartment and bundled with your monthly rent

We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you live is where you come alive. In an area flourishing with convenience, recreation and possibility, Avalon Baker Ranch offers 1-, 2-, and 3-bedroom apartment homes for lease. Imagine entertaining in a modern kitchen with quartz stone countertops and stainless steel appliances. Live your life effortlessly with amenities that include a state-of-the-art fitness center, a sparkling swimming pool and beautifully landscaped courtyards with gas barbecues and fire pits to use as if they were in your own back yard without all of the maintenance. Plus, our technology package, AvalonConnect, offers pre-installed high-speed and common area WiFi, digital resident services including the ability to submit service requests and pay your rent online, smart access entry, smart thermostats, package service, and more. Desirably located near Alton Parkway, Bake Parkway, Interstates 5 and 405, and the 241 Toll Road, commuting is a breeze. This is not just apartment living.
